content: The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with somewhat coarser, less defined boundaries, and these tend to be slightly over-extended, especially on the right.
The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with somewhat coarser, less defined boundaries, and these tend to be slightly over-extended, especially on the bottom right.

The ground truth TRAIN region has been segmented with somewhat coarser, less defined boundaries, and these tend to be slightly over-extended, especially on the left. The bottom boundaries of the region are especially flawed.
The ground truth BOAT region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the rightmost boat, where the top part is missing.

The prediction mask is quite chaotic. The ground truth CHAIR region has been under-segmented, while the DOG region has been over-segmented. Also, BICYCLE regions have been hallucinated all over the scene.
The ground truth BIRD region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the neck, where some BACKGROUND areas have been misclassified as BIRD. The beak is also not well segmented.
The ground truth TVMONITOR region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the top, where the region is under-segmented. The bottom region is also flawed.
The ground truth TRAIN region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the right side of the region, where some BACKGROUND areas have been misclassified as TRAIN.

The ground truth BICYCLE region has been segmented with somewhat coarser, less defined boundaries, especially on the bottom. The PERSON region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and the rightmost PERSON near the right-edge is under-segmented a bit. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as PERSON.

The ground truth PERSON region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the top and on the left. The top of the head is over-segmented, while the left side of the region is under-segmented. Also, the bottom of the glass is missing in the prediction.
The ground truth SHEEP region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the bottom left, and the top left boundary is also flawed.
The ground truth DOG region on the center of the scene has been segmented with somewhat coarser and imperfect boundaries. The top and right boundaries of the region are especially flawed.

The ground truth BOAT region on the center of the scene has been segmented with somewhat coarser boundaries, especially on the top. The BOAT region on the left of the scene is missing in the prediction.
The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with somewhat coarser, less defined boundaries, and these tend to be slightly under-extended. The tail of the AEROPLANE is especially flawed.

The ground truth PERSON region (table) has been over-extended in the prediction, especially on the top and right. The ground truth BOTTLE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the table have been completely misclassified as PERSON.
